featured.text: If and when cars go completely driverless, the benefits will be enormous.
The production of driverless cars is still far away.
Which of the following is NOT a potential benefit of driverless cars?
It is predicted that driverless cars will be ready for sale within five years.

definition.zh_def: 無人駕駛的，指不需要人類駕駛的車輛或技術。
definition.en_def: Operating without a human driver; referring to vehicles or technology that can drive themselves.
definition.example: The new driverless car can navigate through traffic without any human intervention.
